role.argrole: entity arg0 picks correctly to ask

example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 卢秀琴)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 向) (NP-PN (NR 刘益昌))) (VP (VV 打听) (NP-OBJ (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 复原) (NP-OBJ (NN 史前陶)))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 人选)))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 果然)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 问对) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NN 人))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 向 刘益昌 打听 *PRO* 复原 史前陶 的 人选
